topic: How to implement REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to implement REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Implementing REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to create REST APIs using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+. It provides an overview of key concepts, setup, and examples.
key_points: FastAPI is a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+
Supports automatic generation of OpenAPI documentation
Built on top of Starlette and Pydantic
Async support out-of-the-box for scalable performance
Easy to learn and use due to its intuitive syntax
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.72.0 is compatible with Python 3.12
Ensure you have the latest FastAPI and its dependencies installed using pip
caveats: Make sure to handle exceptions appropriately in your application
